verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass the same<WH1931> year,<WH8141> in the beginning<WH7225> of the reign<WH4467> of Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> in the fourth<WH7243> year,<WH8141> and in the fifth<WH2549> month,<WH2320> that Hananiah<WH2608> the son<WH1121> of Azur<WH5809> the prophet,<WH5030> which<WH834> was of Gibeon,<WH1391> spoke<WH559> to me in the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> in the presence<WH5869> of the priests<WH3548> and of all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559>
Thus<WH3541> speaks<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> I have broken<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon.<WH894>

Within<WH5750> two full<WH3117> years<WH8141> will I bring<WH7725> again<WH7725> into this<WH2008> place<WH4725> all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> of the LORD's<WH3068> house,<WH1004> that Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> took<WH3947> away from this<WH2008> place,<WH4725> and carried<WH935> them to Babylon:<WH894>

And I will bring<WH7725> again<WH7725> to this<WH2008> place<WH4725> Jeconiah<WH3204> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> with all<WH3605> the captives<WH1546> of Judah,<WH3063> that went<WH935> into Babylon,<WH894> said<WH5002> the LORD:<WH3068> for I will break<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon.<WH894>

Then the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559> to the prophet<WH5030> Hananiah<WH2608> in the presence<WH5869> of the priests,<WH3548> and in the presence<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that stood<WH5975> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068>

Even the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> said,<WH559> Amen:<WH543> the LORD<WH3068> do<WH6213> so:<WH3651> the LORD<WH3068> perform<WH6965> your words<WH1697> which<WH834> you have prophesied,<WH5012> to bring<WH7725> again<WH7725> the vessels<WH3627> of the LORD's<WH3068> house,<WH1004> and all<WH3605> that is carried<WH1473> away captive,<WH1473> from Babylon<WH894> into<WH413> this<WH2008> place.<WH4725>
Nevertheless<WH389> hear<WH8085> you now<WH4994> this<WH2008> word<WH1697> that I speak<WH1696> in your ears,<WH241> and in the ears<WH241> of all<WH3605> the people;<WH5971>

The prophets<WH5030> that have been<WH1961> before<WH6440> me and before<WH6440> you of old<WH5769> prophesied<WH5012> both against<WH413> many<WH7227> countries,<WH776> and against<WH5921> great<WH1419> kingdoms,<WH4467> of war,<WH4421> and of evil,<WH7451> and of pestilence.<WH1698>

The prophet<WH5030> which<WH834> prophesies<WH5012> of peace,<WH7965> when the word<WH1697> of the prophet<WH5030> shall come<WH935> to pass, then shall the prophet<WH5030> be known,<WH3045> that the LORD<WH3068> has truly<WH571> sent<WH7971> him.
Then Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> took<WH3947> the yoke<WH4133> from off<WH5921> the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah's<WH3414> neck,<WH6677> and broke<WH7665> it.

And Hananiah<WH2608> spoke<WH559> in the presence<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3602> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Even<WH3602> so<WH3602> will I break<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> from the neck<WH6677> of all<WH3605> nations<WH1471> within<WH5750> the space<WH5750> of two full<WH3117> years.<WH8141> And the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> went<WH3212> his way.<WH1870>

Then the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet, after<WH310> that Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> had broken<WH7665> the yoke<WH4133> from off<WH5921> the neck<WH6677> of the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Go<WH1980> and tell<WH559> Hananiah,<WH2608> saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> You have broken<WH7665> the yokes<WH4133> of wood;<WH6086> but you shall make<WH6213> for them yokes<WH4133> of iron.<WH1270>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel;<WH3478> I have put<WH5414> a yoke<WH5923> of iron<WH1270> on the neck<WH6677> of all<WH3605> these<WH428> nations,<WH1471> that they may serve<WH5647> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon;<WH894> and they shall serve<WH5647> him: and I have given<WH5414> him the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> also.<WH1571>

Then said<WH559> the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> to Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet,<WH5030> Hear<WH8085> now,<WH4994> Hananiah;<WH2608> The LORD<WH3068> has not sent<WH7971> you; but you make this<WH2008> people<WH5971> to trust<WH982> in a lie.<WH8267>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Behold,<WH2005> I will cast<WH7971> you from off<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the earth:<WH127> this year<WH8141> you shall die,<WH4191> because<WH3588> you have taught<WH1696> rebellion<WH5627> against<WH413> the LORD.<WH3068>
So Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> died<WH4191> the same<WH1931> year<WH8141> in the seventh<WH7637> month.<WH2320>
